conbody.p: (b) HCAs shall submit to DASN(P) the required congressional notification for termination of any multi-year contract by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 217.170 – Multiyear Contract Termination - Congressional Notification” following the format prescribed in 5205.303. Email notifications are required to be submitted at least 45 days before termination.
